description:
In the aftermath of the brilliant clash of fire versus fire, Irie’s monitor cannot pick up the Gamma and Gokudera’s situation. The battle was so fierce, the camera in the training room where the two battled was destroyed. Did they kill each other off? Irie calmly orders the recovery of the Vongola and Mare Rings when he receives the news. The enemy had posed as a renaissance squad, and their guard has been killed. It seems the attack came in the form of a mysterious fog…?
Source: crunchyroll
